revised_title: An Earthquake in Chattigaon: A Persian Account and Translation
tldr: This article provides a translated account of an earthquake that occurred in Chattigaon, Bengal, in 1762. The author, Edward Gulston, describes the damage and effects of the earthquake on the region, including land subsidence, water overflow, and structural damage to buildings. The account offers a unique historical perspective on the event and its impact on the local population.
